name: Psalm 72:14
text: He will redeem their soul from oppression and violence. Their blood will be precious in his sight.

name: Psalm 72:15
text: They shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba. Men shall pray for him continually. They shall bless him all day long.

name: Psalm 72:16
text: Abundance of grain shall be throughout the land. Its fruit sways like Lebanon. Let it flourish, thriving like the grass of the field.

name: Psalm 72:17
text: His name endures forever. His name continues as long as the sun. Men shall be blessed by him. All nations will call him blessed.

name: Psalm 72:18
text: Praise be to Yahweh God, the God of Israel, who alone does marvelous deeds.

name: Psalm 72:19
text: Blessed be his glorious name forever! Let the whole earth be filled with his glory! Amen and amen.

name: Psalm 72:20
text: This ends the prayers by David, the son of Jesse.

name: Psalm 73:1
text: A Psalm by Asaph. Surely God is good to Israel, to those who are pure in heart.

name: Psalm 73:2
text: But as for me, my feet were almost gone. My steps had nearly slipped.

name: Psalm 73:3
text: For I was envious of the arrogant, when I saw the prosperity of the wicked.

name: Psalm 73:4
text: For there are no struggles in their death, but their strength is firm.

name: Psalm 73:5
text: They are free from burdens of men, neither are they plagued like other men.

name: Psalm 73:6
text: Therefore pride is like a chain around their neck. Violence covers them like a garment.

name: Psalm 73:7
text: Their eyes bulge with fat. Their minds pass the limits of conceit.

name: Psalm 73:8
text: They scoff and speak with malice. In arrogance, they threaten oppression.

name: Psalm 73:9
text: They have set their mouth in the heavens. Their tongue walks through the earth.

name: Psalm 73:10
text: Therefore their people return to them, and they drink up waters of abundance.

name: Psalm 73:11
text: They say, "How does God know? Is there knowledge in the Most High?"

name: Psalm 73:12
text: Behold, these are the wicked. Being always at ease, they increase in riches.

name: Psalm 73:13
text: Surely in vain I have cleansed my heart, and washed my hands in innocence,

name: Psalm 73:14
text: For all day long have I been plagued, and punished every morning.

name: Psalm 73:15
text: If I had said, "I will speak thus;" behold, I would have betrayed the generation of your children.

name: Psalm 73:16
text: When I tried to understand this, it was too painful for me;

name: Psalm 73:17
text: Until I entered God"s sanctuary, and considered their latter end.

name: Psalm 73:18
text: Surely you set them in slippery places. You throw them down to destruction.

name: Psalm 73:19
text: How they are suddenly destroyed! They are completely swept away with terrors.

name: Psalm 73:20
text: As a dream when one wakes up, so, Lord, when you awake, you will despise their fantasies.

name: Psalm 73:21
text: For my soul was grieved. I was embittered in my heart.

name: Psalm 73:22
text: I was so senseless and ignorant. I was a brute beast before you.

name: Psalm 73:23
text: Nevertheless, I am continually with you. You have held my right hand.

name: Psalm 73:24
text: You will guide me with your counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.

name: Psalm 73:25
text: Whom do I have in heaven? There is no one on earth whom I desire besides you.

name: Psalm 73:26
text: My flesh and my heart fails, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.

name: Psalm 73:27
text: For, behold, those who are far from you shall perish. You have destroyed all those who are unfaithful to you.

name: Psalm 73:28
text: But it is good for me to come close to God. I have made the Lord Yahweh my refuge, that I may tell of all your works.

name: Psalm 74:1
text: A contemplation by Asaph. God, why have you rejected us forever? Why does your anger smolder against the sheep of your pasture?

name: Psalm 74:2
text: Remember your congregation, which you purchased of old, which you have redeemed to be the tribe of your inheritance; Mount Zion, in which you have lived.

name: Psalm 74:3
text: Lift up your feet to the perpetual ruins, all the evil that the enemy has done in the sanctuary.

name: Psalm 74:4
text: Your adversaries have roared in the midst of your assembly. They have set up their standards as signs.

name: Psalm 74:5
text: They behaved like men wielding axes, cutting through a thicket of trees.

name: Psalm 74:6
text: Now they break all its carved work down with hatchet and hammers.

name: Psalm 74:7
text: They have burned your sanctuary to the ground. They have profaned the dwelling place of your Name.

name: Psalm 74:8
text: They said in their heart, "We will crush them completely." They have burned up all the places in the land where God was worshiped.

name: Psalm 74:9
text: We see no miraculous signs. There is no longer any prophet, neither is there among us anyone who knows how long.

name: Psalm 74:10
text: How long, God, shall the adversary reproach? Shall the enemy blaspheme your name forever?

name: Psalm 74:11
text: Why do you draw back your hand, even your right hand? Take it out of your pocket and consume them!

name: Psalm 74:12
text: Yet God is my King of old, working salvation in the midst of the earth.

name: Psalm 74:13
text: You divided the sea by your strength. You broke the heads of the sea monsters in the waters.

name: Psalm 74:14
text: You broke the heads of Leviathan in pieces. You gave him as food to people and desert creatures.

name: Psalm 74:15
text: You opened up spring and stream. You dried up mighty rivers.

name: Psalm 74:16
text: The day is yours, the night is also yours. You have prepared the light and the sun.

name: Psalm 74:17
text: You have set all the boundaries of the earth. You have made summer and winter.

name: Psalm 74:18
text: Remember this, that the enemy has mocked you, Yahweh. Foolish people have blasphemed your name.

name: Psalm 74:19
text: Don"t deliver the soul of your dove to wild beasts. Don"t forget the life of your poor forever.

name: Psalm 74:20
text: Honor your covenant, for haunts of violence fill the dark places of the earth.

name: Psalm 74:21
text: Don"t let the oppressed return ashamed. Let the poor and needy praise your name.

name: Psalm 74:22
text: Arise, God! Plead your own cause. Remember how the foolish man mocks you all day.

name: Psalm 74:23
text: Don"t forget the voice of your adversaries. The tumult of those who rise up against you ascends continually.

name: Psalm 75:1
text: For the Chief Musician. To the tune of "Do Not Destroy." A Psalm by Asaph. A song. We give thanks to you, God. We give thanks, for your Name is near. Men tell about your wondrous works.

name: Psalm 75:2
text: When I choose the appointed time, I will judge blamelessly.

name: Psalm 75:3
text: The earth and all its inhabitants quake. I firmly hold its pillars. Selah.

name: Psalm 75:4
text: I said to the arrogant, "Don"t boast!" I said to the wicked, "Don"t lift up the horn.

name: Psalm 75:5
text: Don"t lift up your horn on high. Don"t speak with a stiff neck."

name: Psalm 75:6
text: For neither from the east, nor from the west, nor yet from the south, comes exaltation.

name: Psalm 75:7
text: But God is the judge. He puts down one, and lifts up another.

name: Psalm 75:8
text: For in the hand of Yahweh there is a cup, full of foaming wine mixed with spices. He pours it out. Indeed the wicked of the earth drink and drink it to its very dregs.

name: Psalm 75:9
text: But I will declare this forever: I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.

name: Psalm 75:10
text: I will cut off all the horns of the wicked, but the horns of the righteous shall be lifted up.

name: Psalm 76:1
text: For the Chief Musician. On stringed instruments. A Psalm by Asaph. A song. In Judah, God is known. His name is great in Israel.

name: Psalm 76:2
text: His tabernacle is also in Salem; His dwelling place in Zion.

name: Psalm 76:3
text: There he broke the flaming arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the weapons of war. Selah.

name: Psalm 76:4
text: Glorious are you, and excellent, more than mountains of game.

name: Psalm 76:5
text: Valiant men lie plundered, they have slept their last sleep. None of the men of war can lift their hands.

name: Psalm 76:6
text: At your rebuke, God of Jacob, both chariot and horse are cast into a deep sleep.

name: Psalm 76:7
text: You, even you, are to be feared. Who can stand in your sight when you are angry?

name: Psalm 76:8
text: You pronounced judgment from heaven. The earth feared, and was silent,

name: Psalm 76:9
text: when God arose to judgment, to save all the afflicted ones of the earth. Selah.

name: Psalm 76:10
text: Surely the wrath of man praises you. The survivors of your wrath are restrained.

name: Psalm 76:11
text: Make vows to Yahweh your God, and fulfill them! Let all of his neighbors bring presents to him who is to be feared.

name: Psalm 76:12
text: He will cut off the spirit of princes. He is feared by the kings of the earth.

name: Psalm 77:1
text: For the Chief Musician. To Jeduthun. A Psalm by Asaph. My cry goes to God! Indeed, I cry to God for help, and for him to listen to me.

name: Psalm 77:2
text: In the day of my trouble I sought the Lord. My hand was stretched out in the night, and didn"t get tired. My soul refused to be comforted.

name: Psalm 77:3
text: I remember God, and I groan. I complain, and my spirit is overwhelmed. Selah.

name: Psalm 77:4
text: You hold my eyelids open. I am so troubled that I can"t speak.

name: Psalm 77:5
text: I have considered the days of old, the years of ancient times.

name: Psalm 77:6
text: I remember my song in the night. I consider in my own heart; my spirit diligently inquires:

name: Psalm 77:7
text: "Will the Lord reject us forever? Will he be favorable no more?

name: Psalm 77:8
text: Has his loving kindness vanished forever? Does his promise fail for generations?

name: Psalm 77:9
text: Has God forgotten to be gracious? Has he, in anger, withheld his compassion?" Selah.

name: Psalm 77:10
text: Then I thought, "I will appeal to this: the years of the right hand of the Most High."

name: Psalm 77:11
text: I will remember Yah"s deeds; for I will remember your wonders of old.

name: Psalm 77:12
text: I will also meditate on all your work, and consider your doings.

name: Psalm 77:13
text: Your way, God, is in the sanctuary. What god is great like God?

name: Psalm 77:14
text: You are the God who does wonders. You have made your strength known among the peoples.

name: Psalm 77:15
text: You have redeemed your people with your arm, the sons of Jacob and Joseph. Selah.

name: Psalm 77:16
text: The waters saw you, God. The waters saw you, and they writhed. The depths also convulsed.

name: Psalm 77:17
text: The clouds poured out water. The skies resounded with thunder. Your arrows also flashed around.

name: Psalm 77:18
text: The voice of your thunder was in the whirlwind. The lightnings lit up the world. The earth trembled and shook.

name: Psalm 77:19
text: Your way was through the sea; your paths through the great waters. Your footsteps were not known.

name: Psalm 77:20
text: You led your people like a flock, by the hand of Moses and Aaron.

name: Psalm 78:1
text: A contemplation by Asaph. Hear my teaching, my people. Turn your ears to the words of my mouth.

name: Psalm 78:2
text: I will open my mouth in a parable. I will utter dark sayings of old,

name: Psalm 78:3
text: Which we have heard and known, and our fathers have told us.

name: Psalm 78:4
text: We will not hide them from their children, telling to the generation to come the praises of Yahweh, his strength, and his wondrous works that he has done.

name: Psalm 78:5
text: For he established a testimony in Jacob, and appointed a teaching in Israel, which he commanded our fathers, that they should make them known to their children;

name: Psalm 78:6
text: that the generation to come might know, even the children who should be born; who should arise and tell their children,

name: Psalm 78:7
text: that they might set their hope in God, and not forget the works of God, but keep his commandments,

name: Psalm 78:8
text: and might not be as their fathers, a stubborn and rebellious generation, a generation that didn"t make their hearts loyal, whose spirit was not steadfast with God.

name: Psalm 78:9
text: The children of Ephraim, being armed and carrying bows, turned back in the day of battle.

name: Psalm 78:10
text: They didn"t keep God"s covenant, and refused to walk in his law.

name: Psalm 78:11
text: They forgot his doings, his wondrous works that he had shown them.

name: Psalm 78:12
text: He did marvelous things in the sight of their fathers, in the land of Egypt, in the field of Zoan.

name: Psalm 78:13
text: He split the sea, and caused them to pass through. He made the waters stand as a heap.

name: Psalm 78:14
text: In the daytime he also led them with a cloud, and all night with a light of fire.

name: Psalm 78:15
text: He split rocks in the wilderness, and gave them drink abundantly as out of the depths.

name: Psalm 78:16
text: He brought streams also out of the rock, and caused waters to run down like rivers.

name: Psalm 78:17
text: Yet they still went on to sin against him, to rebel against the Most High in the desert.

name: Psalm 78:18
text: They tempted God in their heart by asking food according to their desire.

name: Psalm 78:19
text: Yes, they spoke against God. They said, "Can God prepare a table in the wilderness?

name: Psalm 78:20
text: Behold, he struck the rock, so that waters gushed out, and streams overflowed. Can he give bread also? Will he provide flesh for his people?"

name: Psalm 78:21
text: Therefore Yahweh heard, and was angry. A fire was kindled against Jacob, anger also went up against Israel,

name: Psalm 78:22
text: because they didn"t believe in God, and didn"t trust in his salvation.

name: Psalm 78:23
text: Yet he commanded the skies above, and opened the doors of heaven.

name: Psalm 78:24
text: He rained down manna on them to eat, and gave them food from the sky.

name: Psalm 78:25
text: Man ate the bread of angels. He sent them food to the full.

name: Psalm 78:26
text: He caused the east wind to blow in the sky. By his power he guided the south wind.

name: Psalm 78:27
text: He rained also flesh on them as the dust; winged birds as the sand of the seas.

name: Psalm 78:28
text: He let them fall in the midst of their camp, around their habitations.

name: Psalm 78:29
text: So they ate, and were well filled. He gave them their own desire.

name: Psalm 78:30
text: They didn"t turn from their cravings. Their food was yet in their mouths,

name: Psalm 78:31
text: when the anger of God went up against them, killed some of their fattest, and struck down the young men of Israel.

name: Psalm 78:32
text: For all this they still sinned, and didn"t believe in his wondrous works.

name: Psalm 78:33
text: Therefore he consumed their days in vanity, and their years in terror.

name: Psalm 78:34
text: When he killed them, then they inquired after him. They returned and sought God earnestly.

name: Psalm 78:35
text: They remembered that God was their rock, the Most High God, their redeemer.

name: Psalm 78:36
text: But they flattered him with their mouth, and lied to him with their tongue.

name: Psalm 78:37
text: For their heart was not right with him, neither were they faithful in his covenant.

name: Psalm 78:38
text: But he, being merciful, forgave iniquity, and didn"t destroy them. Yes, many times he turned his anger away, and didn"t stir up all his wrath.

name: Psalm 78:39
text: He remembered that they were but flesh, a wind that passes away, and doesn"t come again.

name: Psalm 78:40
text: How often they rebelled against him in the wilderness, and grieved him in the desert!

name: Psalm 78:41
text: They turned again and tempted God, and provoked the Holy One of Israel.

name: Psalm 78:42
text: They didn"t remember his hand, nor the day when he redeemed them from the adversary;

name: Psalm 78:43
text: how he set his signs in Egypt, his wonders in the field of Zoan,

name: Psalm 78:44
text: he turned their rivers into blood, and their streams, so that they could not drink.

name: Psalm 78:45
text: He sent among them swarms of flies, which devoured them; and frogs, which destroyed them.

name: Psalm 78:46
text: He gave also their increase to the caterpillar, and their labor to the locust.

name: Psalm 78:47
text: He destroyed their vines with hail, their sycamore fig trees with frost.

name: Psalm 78:48
text: He gave over their livestock also to the hail, and their flocks to hot thunderbolts.

name: Psalm 78:49
text: He threw on them the fierceness of his anger, wrath, indignation, and trouble, and a band of angels of evil.

name: Psalm 78:50
text: He made a path for his anger. He didn"t spare their soul from death, but gave their life over to the pestilence,

name: Psalm 78:51
text: and struck all the firstborn in Egypt, the chief of their strength in the tents of Ham.

name: Psalm 78:52
text: But he led forth his own people like sheep, and guided them in the wilderness like a flock.

name: Psalm 78:53
text: He led them safely, so that they weren"t afraid, but the sea overwhelmed their enemies.

name: Psalm 78:54
text: He brought them to the border of his sanctuary, to this mountain, which his right hand had taken.

name: Psalm 78:55
text: He also drove out the nations before them, allotted them for an inheritance by line, and made the tribes of Israel to dwell in their tents.

name: Psalm 78:56
text: Yet they tempted and rebelled against the Most High God, and didn"t keep his testimonies;

name: Psalm 78:57
text: but turned back, and dealt treacherously like their fathers. They were turned aside like a deceitful bow.

name: Psalm 78:58
text: For they provoked him to anger with their high places, and moved him to jealousy with their engraved images.

name: Psalm 78:59
text: When God heard this, he was angry, and greatly abhorred Israel;

name: Psalm 78:60
text: So that he forsook the tent of Shiloh, the tent which he placed among men;

name: Psalm 78:61
text: and delivered his strength into captivity, his glory into the adversary"s hand.

name: Psalm 78:62
text: He also gave his people over to the sword, and was angry with his inheritance.

name: Psalm 78:63
text: Fire devoured their young men. Their virgins had no wedding song.

name: Psalm 78:64
text: Their priests fell by the sword, and their widows couldn"t weep.

name: Psalm 78:65
text: Then the Lord awakened as one out of sleep, like a mighty man who shouts by reason of wine.

name: Psalm 78:66
text: He struck his adversaries backward. He put them to a perpetual reproach.

name: Psalm 78:67
text: Moreover he rejected the tent of Joseph, and didn"t choose the tribe of Ephraim,

name: Psalm 78:68
text: But chose the tribe of Judah, Mount Zion which he loved.

name: Psalm 78:69
text: He built his sanctuary like the heights, like the earth which he has established forever.

name: Psalm 78:70
text: He also chose David his servant, and took him from the sheepfolds;

name: Psalm 78:71
text: from following the ewes that have their young, he brought him to be the shepherd of Jacob, his people, and Israel, his inheritance.

name: Psalm 78:72
text: So he was their shepherd according to the integrity of his heart, and guided them by the skillfulness of his hands.

name: Psalm 79:1
text: A Psalm by Asaph. God, the nations have come into your inheritance. They have defiled your holy temple. They have laid Jerusalem in heaps.

name: Psalm 79:2
text: They have given the dead bodies of your servants to be food for the birds of the sky, the flesh of your saints to the animals of the earth.

name: Psalm 79:3
text: Their blood they have shed like water around Jerusalem. There was no one to bury them.

name: Psalm 79:4
text: We have become a reproach to our neighbors, a scoffing and derision to those who are around us.

name: Psalm 79:5
text: How long, Yahweh? Will you be angry forever? Will your jealousy burn like fire?

name: Psalm 79:6
text: Pour out your wrath on the nations that don"t know you; on the kingdoms that don"t call on your name;

name: Psalm 79:7
text: For they have devoured Jacob, and destroyed his homeland.

name: Psalm 79:8
text: Don"t hold the iniquities of our forefathers against us. Let your tender mercies speedily meet us, for we are in desperate need.

name: Psalm 79:9
text: Help us, God of our salvation, for the glory of your name. Deliver us, and forgive our sins, for your name"s sake.

name: Psalm 79:10
text: Why should the nations say, "Where is their God?" Let it be known among the nations, before our eyes, that vengeance for your servants" blood is being poured out.

name: Psalm 79:11
text: Let the sighing of the prisoner come before you. According to the greatness of your power, preserve those who are sentenced to death.

name: Psalm 79:12
text: Pay back to our neighbors seven times into their bosom their reproach with which they have reproached you, Lord.

name: Psalm 79:13
text: So we, your people and sheep of your pasture, will give you thanks forever. We will praise you forever, to all generations.

name: Psalm 80:1
text: For the Chief Musician. To the tune of "The Lilies of the Covenant." A Psalm by Asaph. Hear us, Shepherd of Israel, you who lead Joseph like a flock, you who sit above the cherubim, shine forth.

name: Psalm 80:2
text: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh, stir up your might! Come to save us!

name: Psalm 80:3
text: Turn us again, God. Cause your face to shine, and we will be saved.

name: Psalm 80:4
text: Yahweh God of Armies, How long will you be angry against the prayer of your people?

name: Psalm 80:5
text: You have fed them with the bread of tears, and given them tears to drink in large measure.

name: Psalm 80:6
text: You make us a source of contention to our neighbors. Our enemies laugh among themselves.

name: Psalm 80:7
text: Turn us again, God of Armies. Cause your face to shine, and we will be saved.

name: Psalm 80:8
text: You brought a vine out of Egypt. You drove out the nations, and planted it.

name: Psalm 80:9
text: You cleared the ground for it. It took deep root, and filled the land.

name: Psalm 80:10
text: The mountains were covered with its shadow. Its boughs were like God"s cedars.

name: Psalm 80:11
text: It sent out its branches to the sea, Its shoots to the River.

name: Psalm 80:12
text: Why have you broken down its walls, so that all those who pass by the way pluck it?

name: Psalm 80:13
text: The boar out of the wood ravages it. The wild animals of the field feed on it.

name: Psalm 80:14
text: Turn again, we beg you, God of Armies. Look down from heaven, and see, and visit this vine,

name: Psalm 80:15
text: the stock which your right hand planted, the branch that you made strong for yourself.

name: Psalm 80:16
text: It"s burned with fire. It"s cut down. They perish at your rebuke.

name: Psalm 80:17
text: Let your hand be on the man of your right hand, on the son of man whom you made strong for yourself.

name: Psalm 80:18
text: So we will not turn away from you. Revive us, and we will call on your name.

name: Psalm 80:19
text: Turn us again, Yahweh God of Armies. Cause your face to shine, and we will be saved.

name: Psalm 81:1
text: For the Chief Musician. On an instrument of Gath. By Asaph. Sing aloud to God, our strength! Make a joyful shout to the God of Jacob!

name: Psalm 81:2
text: Raise a song, and bring here the tambourine, the pleasant lyre with the harp.

name: Psalm 81:3
text: Blow the trumpet at the New Moon, at the full moon, on our feast day.

name: Psalm 81:4
text: For it is a statute for Israel, an ordinance of the God of Jacob.

name: Psalm 81:5
text: He appointed it in Joseph for a testimony, when he went out over the land of Egypt, I heard a language that I didn"t know.

name: Psalm 81:6
text: "I removed his shoulder from the burden. His hands were freed from the basket.

name: Psalm 81:7
text: You called in trouble, and I delivered you. I answered you in the secret place of thunder. I tested you at the waters of Meribah." Selah.

name: Psalm 81:8
text: "Hear, my people, and I will testify to you, Israel, if you would listen to me!

name: Psalm 81:9
text: There shall be no strange god in you, neither shall you worship any foreign god.

name: Psalm 81:10
text: I am Yahweh, your God, who brought you up out of the land of Egypt. Open your mouth wide, and I will fill it.

name: Psalm 81:11
text: But my people didn"t listen to my voice. Israel desired none of me.

name: Psalm 81:12
text: So I let them go after the stubbornness of their hearts, that they might walk in their own counsels.

name: Psalm 81:13
text: Oh that my people would listen to me, that Israel would walk in my ways!

name: Psalm 81:14
text: I would soon subdue their enemies, and turn my hand against their adversaries.

name: Psalm 81:15
text: The haters of Yahweh would cringe before him, and their punishment would last forever.

name: Psalm 81:16
text: But he would have also fed them with the finest of the wheat. I will satisfy you with honey out of the rock."

name: Psalm 82:1
text: A Psalm by Asaph. God presides in the great assembly. He judges among the gods.

name: Psalm 82:2
text: "How long will you judge unjustly, and show partiality to the wicked?" Selah.

name: Psalm 82:3
text: "Defend the weak, the poor, and the fatherless. Maintain the rights of the poor and oppressed.

name: Psalm 82:4
text: Rescue the weak and needy. Deliver them out of the hand of the wicked."

name: Psalm 82:5
text: They don"t know, neither do they understand. They walk back and forth in darkness. All the foundations of the earth are shaken.

name: Psalm 82:6
text: I said, "You are gods, all of you are sons of the Most High.

name: Psalm 82:7
text: Nevertheless you shall die like men, and fall like one of the rulers."

name: Psalm 82:8
text: Arise, God, judge the earth, for you inherit all of the nations.

name: Psalm 83:1
text: A song. A Psalm by Asaph. God, don"t keep silent. Don"t keep silent, and don"t be still, God.

name: Psalm 83:2
text: For, behold, your enemies are stirred up. Those who hate you have lifted up their heads.

name: Psalm 83:3
text: They conspire with cunning against your people. They plot against your cherished ones.

name: Psalm 83:4
text: "Come," they say, "and let"s destroy them as a nation, that the name of Israel may be remembered no more."

name: Psalm 83:5
text: For they have conspired together with one mind. They form an alliance against you.

name: Psalm 83:6
text: The tents of Edom and the Ishmaelites; Moab, and the Hagrites;

name: Psalm 83:7
text: Gebal, Ammon, and Amalek; Philistia with the inhabitants of Tyre;

name: Psalm 83:8
text: Assyria also is joined with them. They have helped the children of Lot. Selah.

name: Psalm 83:9
text: Do to them as you did to Midian, as to Sisera, as to Jabin, at the river Kishon;

name: Psalm 83:10
text: who perished at Endor, who became as dung for the earth.

name: Psalm 83:11
text: Make their nobles like Oreb and Zeeb; yes, all their princes like Zebah and Zalmunna;

name: Psalm 83:12
text: who said, "Let us take possession of God"s pasturelands."

name: Psalm 83:13
text: My God, make them like tumbleweed; like chaff before the wind.

name: Psalm 83:14
text: As the fire that burns the forest, as the flame that sets the mountains on fire,

name: Psalm 83:15
text: so pursue them with your tempest, and terrify them with your storm.

name: Psalm 83:16
text: Fill their faces with confusion, that they may seek your name, Yahweh.

name: Psalm 83:17
text: Let them be disappointed and dismayed forever. Yes, let them be confounded and perish;

name: Psalm 83:18
text: that they may know that you alone, whose name is Yahweh, are the Most High over all the earth.

name: Psalm 84:1
text: For the Chief Musician. On an instrument of Gath. A Psalm by the sons of Korah. How lovely are your dwellings, Yahweh of Armies!

name: Psalm 84:2
text: My soul longs, and even faints for the courts of Yahweh. My heart and my flesh cry out for the living God.

name: Psalm 84:3
text: Yes, the sparrow has found a home, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she may have her young, near your altars, Yahweh of Armies, my King, and my God.

name: Psalm 84:4
text: Blessed are those who dwell in your house. They are always praising you. Selah.

name: Psalm 84:5
text: Blessed are those whose strength is in you; who have set their hearts on a pilgrimage.

name: Psalm 84:6
text: Passing through the valley of Weeping, they make it a place of springs. Yes, the autumn rain covers it with blessings.

name: Psalm 84:7
text: They go from strength to strength. Everyone of them appears before God in Zion.

name: Psalm 84:8
text: Yahweh, God of Armies, hear my prayer. Listen, God of Jacob. Selah.

name: Psalm 84:9
text: Behold, God our shield, look at the face of your anointed.

name: Psalm 84:10
text: For a day in your courts is better than a thousand. I would rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.

name: Psalm 84:11
text: For Yahweh God is a sun and a shield. Yahweh will give grace and glory. He withholds no good thing from those who walk blamelessly.

name: Psalm 84:12
text: Yahweh of Armies, blessed is the man who trusts in you.

name: Psalm 85:1
text: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by the sons of Korah. Yahweh, you have been favorable to your land. You have restored the fortunes of Jacob.

name: Psalm 85:2
text: You have forgiven the iniquity of your people. You have covered all their sin. Selah.

name: Psalm 85:3
text: You have taken away all your wrath. You have turned from the fierceness of your anger.

name: Psalm 85:4
text: Turn us, God of our salvation, and cause your indignation toward us to cease.

name: Psalm 85:5
text: Will you be angry with us forever? Will you draw out your anger to all generations?

name: Psalm 85:6
text: Won"t you revive us again, that your people may rejoice in you?

name: Psalm 85:7
text: Show us your loving kindness, Yahweh. Grant us your salvation.

name: Psalm 85:8
text: I will hear what God, Yahweh, will speak, for he will speak peace to his people, his saints; but let them not turn again to folly.

name: Psalm 85:9
text: Surely his salvation is near those who fear him, that glory may dwell in our land.

name: Psalm 85:10
text: Mercy and truth meet together. Righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

name: Psalm 85:11
text: Truth springs out of the earth. Righteousness has looked down from heaven.

name: Psalm 85:12
text: Yes, Yahweh will give that which is good. Our land will yield its increase.

name: Psalm 85:13
text: Righteousness goes before him, And prepares the way for his steps.

name: Psalm 86:1
text: A Prayer by David. Hear, Yahweh, and answer me, for I am poor and needy.

name: Psalm 86:2
text: Preserve my soul, for I am godly. You, my God, save your servant who trusts in you.

name: Psalm 86:3
text: Be merciful to me, Lord, for I call to you all day long.

name: Psalm 86:4
text: Bring joy to the soul of your servant, for to you, Lord, do I lift up my soul.

name: Psalm 86:5
text: For you, Lord, are good, and ready to forgive; abundant in loving kindness to all those who call on you.

name: Psalm 86:6
text: Hear, Yahweh, my prayer. Listen to the voice of my petitions.

name: Psalm 86:7
text: In the day of my trouble I will call on you, for you will answer me.

name: Psalm 86:8
text: There is no one like you among the gods, Lord, nor any deeds like your deeds.

name: Psalm 86:9
text: All nations you have made will come and worship before you, Lord. They shall glorify your name.

name: Psalm 86:10
text: For you are great, and do wondrous things. You are God alone.

name: Psalm 86:11
text: Teach me your way, Yahweh. I will walk in your truth. Make my heart undivided to fear your name.

name: Psalm 86:12
text: I will praise you, Lord my God, with my whole heart. I will glorify your name forevermore.

name: Psalm 86:13
text: For your loving kindness is great toward me. You have delivered my soul from the lowest Sheol.

name: Psalm 86:14
text: God, the proud have risen up against me. A company of violent men have sought after my soul, and they don"t hold regard for you before them.

name: Psalm 86:15
text: But you, Lord, are a merciful and gracious God, slow to anger, and abundant in loving kindness and truth.

name: Psalm 86:16
text: Turn to me, and have mercy on me! Give your strength to your servant. Save the son of your handmaid.

name: Psalm 86:17
text: Show me a sign of your goodness, that those who hate me may see it, and be shamed, because you, Yahweh, have helped me, and comforted me.

name: Psalm 87:1
text: A Psalm by the sons of Korah; a Song. His foundation is in the holy mountains.

name: Psalm 87:2
text: Yahweh loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.

name: Psalm 87:3
text: Glorious things are spoken about you, city of God. Selah.

name: Psalm 87:4
text: I will record Rahab and Babylon among those who acknowledge me. Behold, Philistia, Tyre, and also Ethiopia: "This one was born there."

name: Psalm 87:5
text: Yes, of Zion it will be said, "This one and that one was born in her;" the Most High himself will establish her.

name: Psalm 87:6
text: Yahweh will count, when he writes up the peoples, "This one was born there." Selah.

name: Psalm 87:7
text: Those who sing as well as those who dance say, "All my springs are in you."

name: Psalm 88:1
text: A Song. A Psalm by the sons of Korah. For the Chief Musician. To the tune of "The Suffering of Affliction." A contemplation by Heman, the Ezrahite. Yahweh, the God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before you.

name: Psalm 88:2
text: Let my prayer enter into your presence. Turn your ear to my cry.

name: Psalm 88:3
text: For my soul is full of troubles. My life draws near to Sheol.

name: Psalm 88:4
text: I am counted among those who go down into the pit. I am like a man who has no help,

name: Psalm 88:5
text: set apart among the dead, like the slain who lie in the grave, whom you remember no more. They are cut off from your hand.

name: Psalm 88:6
text: You have laid me in the lowest pit, in the darkest depths.

name: Psalm 88:7
text: Your wrath lies heavily on me. You have afflicted me with all your waves. Selah.

name: Psalm 88:8
text: You have taken my friends from me. You have made me an abomination to them. I am confined, and I can"t escape.

name: Psalm 88:9
text: My eyes are dim from grief. I have called on you daily, Yahweh. I have spread out my hands to you.

name: Psalm 88:10
text: Do you show wonders to the dead? Do the dead rise up and praise you? Selah.

name: Psalm 88:11
text: Is your loving kindness declared in the grave? Or your faithfulness in Destruction?

name: Psalm 88:12
text: Are your wonders made known in the dark? Or your righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?

name: Psalm 88:13
text: But to you, Yahweh, I have cried. In the morning, my prayer comes before you.

name: Psalm 88:14
text: Yahweh, why do you reject my soul? Why do you hide your face from me?

name: Psalm 88:15
text: I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up. While I suffer your terrors, I am distracted.

name: Psalm 88:16
text: Your fierce wrath has gone over me. Your terrors have cut me off.

name: Psalm 88:17
text: They came around me like water all day long. They completely engulfed me.

name: Psalm 88:18
text: You have put lover and friend far from me, and my friends into darkness.

name: Psalm 89:1
text: A contemplation by Ethan, the Ezrahite. I will sing of the loving kindness of Yahweh forever. With my mouth, I will make known your faithfulness to all generations.

name: Psalm 89:2
text: I indeed declare, "Love stands firm forever. You established the heavens. Your faithfulness is in them."

name: Psalm 89:3
text: "I have made a covenant with my chosen one, I have sworn to David, my servant,

name: Psalm 89:4
text: "I will establish your seed forever, and build up your throne to all generations."" Selah.

name: Psalm 89:5
text: The heavens will praise your wonders, Yahweh; your faithfulness also in the assembly of the holy ones.

name: Psalm 89:6
text: For who in the skies can be compared to Yahweh? Who among the sons of the heavenly beings is like Yahweh,

name: Psalm 89:7
text: a very awesome God in the council of the holy ones, to be feared above all those who are around him?

name: Psalm 89:8
text: Yahweh, God of Armies, who is a mighty one, like you? Yah, your faithfulness is around you.

name: Psalm 89:9
text: You rule the pride of the sea. When its waves rise up, you calm them.

name: Psalm 89:10
text: You have broken Rahab in pieces, like one of the slain. You have scattered your enemies with your mighty arm.

name: Psalm 89:11
text: The heavens are yours. The earth also is yours; the world and its fullness. You have founded them.

name: Psalm 89:12
text: The north and the south, you have created them. Tabor and Hermon rejoice in your name.

name: Psalm 89:13
text: You have a mighty arm. Your hand is strong, and your right hand is exalted.

name: Psalm 89:14
text: Righteousness and justice are the foundation of your throne. Loving kindness and truth go before your face.

name: Psalm 89:15
text: Blessed are the people who learn to acclaim you. They walk in the light of your presence, Yahweh.

name: Psalm 89:16
text: In your name they rejoice all day. In your righteousness, they are exalted.

name: Psalm 89:17
text: For you are the glory of their strength. In your favor, our horn will be exalted.

name: Psalm 89:18
text: For our shield belongs to Yahweh; our king to the Holy One of Israel.

name: Psalm 89:19
text: Then you spoke in vision to your saints, and said, "I have bestowed strength on the warrior. I have exalted a young man from the people.

name: Psalm 89:20
text: I have found David, my servant. I have anointed him with my holy oil,

name: Psalm 89:21
text: with whom my hand shall be established. My arm will also strengthen him.

name: Psalm 89:22
text: No enemy will tax him. No wicked man will oppress him.

name: Psalm 89:23
text: I will beat down his adversaries before him, and strike those who hate him.

name: Psalm 89:24
text: But my faithfulness and my loving kindness will be with him. In my name, his horn will be exalted.

name: Psalm 89:25
text: I will set his hand also on the sea, and his right hand on the rivers.

name: Psalm 89:26
text: He will call to me, "You are my Father, my God, and the rock of my salvation!"

name: Psalm 89:27
text: I will also appoint him my firstborn, the highest of the kings of the earth.

name: Psalm 89:28
text: I will keep my loving kindness for him forevermore. My covenant will stand firm with him.

name: Psalm 89:29
text: I will also make his seed endure forever, and his throne as the days of heaven.

name: Psalm 89:30
text: If his children forsake my law, and don"t walk in my ordinances;

name: Psalm 89:31
text: if they break my statutes, and don"t keep my commandments;

name: Psalm 89:32
text: then I will punish their sin with the rod, and their iniquity with stripes.

name: Psalm 89:33
text: But I will not completely take my loving kindness from him, nor allow my faithfulness to fail.

name: Psalm 89:34
text: I will not break my covenant, nor alter what my lips have uttered.

name: Psalm 89:35
text: Once have I sworn by my holiness, I will not lie to David.

name: Psalm 89:36
text: His seed will endure forever, his throne like the sun before me.

name: Psalm 89:37
text: It will be established forever like the moon, the faithful witness in the sky." Selah.

name: Psalm 89:38
text: But you have rejected and spurned. You have been angry with your anointed.

name: Psalm 89:39
text: You have renounced the covenant of your servant. You have defiled his crown in the dust.

name: Psalm 89:40
text: You have broken down all his hedges. You have brought his strongholds to ruin.

name: Psalm 89:41
text: All who pass by the way rob him. He has become a reproach to his neighbors.

name: Psalm 89:42
text: You have exalted the right hand of his adversaries. You have made all of his enemies rejoice.

name: Psalm 89:43
text: Yes, you turn back the edge of his sword, and haven"t supported him in battle.

name: Psalm 89:44
text: You have ended his splendor, and thrown his throne down to the ground.

name: Psalm 89:45
text: You have shortened the days of his youth. You have covered him with shame. Selah.

name: Psalm 89:46
text: How long, Yahweh? Will you hide yourself forever? Will your wrath burn like fire?

name: Psalm 89:47
text: Remember how short my time is! For what vanity have you created all the children of men!

name: Psalm 89:48
text: What man is he who shall live and not see death, who shall deliver his soul from the power of Sheol? Selah.

name: Psalm 89:49
text: Lord, where are your former loving kindnesses, which you swore to David in your faithfulness?

name: Psalm 89:50
text: Remember, Lord, the reproach of your servants, how I bear in my heart the taunts of all the mighty peoples,

name: Psalm 89:51
text: With which your enemies have mocked, Yahweh, with which they have mocked the footsteps of your anointed one.

name: Psalm 89:52
text: Blessed be Yahweh forevermore. Amen, and Amen.

name: Psalm 90:1
text: A Prayer by Moses, the man of God. Lord, you have been our dwelling place for all generations.

name: Psalm 90:2
text: Before the mountains were brought forth, before you had formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, you are God.

name: Psalm 90:3
text: You turn man to destruction, saying, "Return, you children of men."

name: Psalm 90:4
text: For a thousand years in your sight are just like yesterday when it is past, like a watch in the night.

name: Psalm 90:5
text: You sweep them away as they sleep. In the morning they sprout like new grass.

name: Psalm 90:6
text: In the morning it sprouts and springs up. By evening, it is withered and dry.

name: Psalm 90:7
text: For we are consumed in your anger. We are troubled in your wrath.

name: Psalm 90:8
text: You have set our iniquities before you, our secret sins in the light of your presence.

name: Psalm 90:9
text: For all our days have passed away in your wrath. We bring our years to an end as a sigh.

name: Psalm 90:10
text: The days of our years are seventy, or even by reason of strength eighty years; yet their pride is but labor and sorrow, for it passes quickly, and we fly away.

name: Psalm 90:11
text: Who knows the power of your anger, your wrath according to the fear that is due to you?

name: Psalm 90:12
text: So teach us to number our days, that we may gain a heart of wisdom.

name: Psalm 90:13
text: Relent, Yahweh! How long? Have compassion on your servants!

name: Psalm 90:14
text: Satisfy us in the morning with your loving kindness, that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.

name: Psalm 90:15
text: Make us glad for as many days as you have afflicted us, for as many years as we have seen evil.

name: Psalm 90:16
text: Let your work appear to your servants; your glory to their children.

name: Psalm 90:17
text: Let the favor of the Lord our God be on us; establish the work of our hands for us; yes, establish the work of our hands.

name: Psalm 91:1
text: He who dwells in the secret place of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.

name: Psalm 91:2
text: I will say of Yahweh, "He is my refuge and my fortress; my God, in whom I trust."

name: Psalm 91:3
text: For he will deliver you from the snare of the fowler, and from the deadly pestilence.

name: Psalm 91:4
text: He will cover you with his feathers. Under his wings you will take refuge. His faithfulness is your shield and rampart.

name: Psalm 91:5
text: You shall not be afraid of the terror by night, nor of the arrow that flies by day;

name: Psalm 91:6
text: nor of the pestilence that walks in darkness, nor of the destruction that wastes at noonday.

name: Psalm 91:7
text: A thousand may fall at your side, and ten thousand at your right hand; but it will not come near you.

name: Psalm 91:8
text: You will only look with your eyes, and see the recompense of the wicked.

name: Psalm 91:9
text: Because you have made Yahweh your refuge, and the Most High your dwelling place,

name: Psalm 91:10
text: no evil shall happen to you, neither shall any plague come near your dwelling.

name: Psalm 91:11
text: For he will put his angels in charge of you, to guard you in all your ways.

name: Psalm 91:12
text: They will bear you up in their hands, so that you won"t dash your foot against a stone.

name: Psalm 91:13
text: You will tread on the lion and cobra. You will trample the young lion and the serpent underfoot.

name: Psalm 91:14
text: "Because he has set his love on me, therefore I will deliver him. I will set him on high, because he has known my name.

name: Psalm 91:15
text: He will call on me, and I will answer him. I will be with him in trouble. I will deliver him, and honor him.

name: Psalm 91:16
text: I will satisfy him with long life, and show him my salvation."

name: Psalm 92:1
text: A Psalm. A song for the Sabbath day. It is a good thing to give thanks to Yahweh, to sing praises to your name, Most High;

name: Psalm 92:2
text: to proclaim your loving kindness in the morning, and your faithfulness every night,

name: Psalm 92:3
text: with the ten-stringed lute, with the harp, and with the melody of the lyre.

name: Psalm 92:4
text: For you, Yahweh, have made me glad through your work. I will triumph in the works of your hands.

name: Psalm 92:5
text: How great are your works, Yahweh! Your thoughts are very deep.

name: Psalm 92:6
text: A senseless man doesn"t know, neither does a fool understand this:

name: Psalm 92:7
text: though the wicked spring up as the grass, and all the evildoers flourish, they will be destroyed forever.

name: Psalm 92:8
text: But you, Yahweh, are on high forevermore.

name: Psalm 92:9
text: For, behold, your enemies, Yahweh, for, behold, your enemies shall perish. All the evildoers will be scattered.

name: Psalm 92:10
text: But you have exalted my horn like that of the wild ox. I am anointed with fresh oil.

name: Psalm 92:11
text: My eye has also seen my enemies. My ears have heard of the wicked enemies who rise up against me.

name: Psalm 92:12
text: The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree. He will grow like a cedar in Lebanon.

name: Psalm 92:13
text: They are planted in Yahweh"s house. They will flourish in our God"s courts.

name: Psalm 92:14
text: They will still bring forth fruit in old age. They will be full of sap and green,

name: Psalm 92:15
text: to show that Yahweh is upright. He is my rock, and there is no unrighteousness in him.

name: Psalm 93:1
text: Yahweh reigns! He is clothed with majesty! Yahweh is armed with strength. The world also is established. It can"t be moved.

name: Psalm 93:2
text: Your throne is established from long ago. You are from everlasting.

name: Psalm 93:3
text: The floods have lifted up, Yahweh, the floods have lifted up their voice. The floods lift up their waves.

name: Psalm 93:4
text: Above the voices of many waters, the mighty breakers of the sea, Yahweh on high is mighty.

name: Psalm 93:5
text: Your statutes stand firm. Holiness adorns your house, Yahweh, forevermore.

name: Psalm 94:1
text: Yahweh, you God to whom vengeance belongs, you God to whom vengeance belongs, shine forth.

name: Psalm 94:2
text: Rise up, you judge of the earth. Pay back the proud what they deserve.

name: Psalm 94:3
text: Yahweh, how long will the wicked, how long will the wicked triumph?

name: Psalm 94:4
text: They pour out arrogant words. All the evildoers boast.

name: Psalm 94:5
text: They break your people in pieces, Yahweh, and afflict your heritage.

name: Psalm 94:6
text: They kill the widow and the alien, and murder the fatherless.

name: Psalm 94:7
text: They say, "Yah will not see, neither will Jacob"s God consider."

name: Psalm 94:8
text: Consider, you senseless among the people; you fools, when will you be wise?

name: Psalm 94:9
text: He who implanted the ear, won"t he hear? He who formed the eye, won"t he see?

name: Psalm 94:10
text: He who disciplines the nations, won"t he punish? He who teaches man knows.

name: Psalm 94:11
text: Yahweh knows the thoughts of man, that they are futile.

name: Psalm 94:12
text: Blessed is the man whom you discipline, Yah, and teach out of your law;

name: Psalm 94:13
text: that you may give him rest from the days of adversity, until the pit is dug for the wicked.

name: Psalm 94:14
text: For Yahweh won"t reject his people, neither will he forsake his inheritance.

name: Psalm 94:15
text: For judgment will return to righteousness. All the upright in heart shall follow it.

name: Psalm 94:16
text: Who will rise up for me against the wicked? Who will stand up for me against the evildoers?

name: Psalm 94:17
text: Unless Yahweh had been my help, my soul would have soon lived in silence.

name: Psalm 94:18
text: When I said, "My foot is slipping!" Your loving kindness, Yahweh, held me up.

name: Psalm 94:19
text: In the multitude of my thoughts within me, your comforts delight my soul.

name: Psalm 94:20
text: Shall the throne of wickedness have fellowship with you, which brings about mischief by statute?

name: Psalm 94:21
text: They gather themselves together against the soul of the righteous, and condemn the innocent blood.

name: Psalm 94:22
text: But Yahweh has been my high tower, my God, the rock of my refuge.

name: Psalm 94:23
text: He has brought on them their own iniquity, and will cut them off in their own wickedness. Yahweh, our God, will cut them off.

name: Psalm 95:1
text: Oh come, let"s sing to Yahweh. Let"s shout aloud to the rock of our salvation!

name: Psalm 95:2
text: Let"s come before his presence with thanksgiving. Let"s extol him with songs!

name: Psalm 95:3
text: For Yahweh is a great God, a great King above all gods.

name: Psalm 95:4
text: In his hand are the deep places of the earth. The heights of the mountains are also his.

name: Psalm 95:5
text: The sea is his, and he made it. His hands formed the dry land.

name: Psalm 95:6
text: Oh come, let"s worship and bow down. Let"s kneel before Yahweh, our Maker,

name: Psalm 95:7
text: for he is our God. We are the people of his pasture, and the sheep in his care. Today, oh that you would hear his voice!

name: Psalm 95:8
text: Don"t harden your heart, as at Meribah, as in the day of Massah in the wilderness,

name: Psalm 95:9
text: when your fathers tempted me, tested me, and saw my work.

name: Psalm 95:10
text: Forty long years I was grieved with that generation, and said, "It is a people that errs in their heart. They have not known my ways."

name: Psalm 95:11
text: Therefore I swore in my wrath, "They won"t enter into my rest."

name: Psalm 96:1
text: Sing to Yahweh a new song! Sing to Yahweh, all the earth.

name: Psalm 96:2
text: Sing to Yahweh! Bless his name! Proclaim his salvation from day to day!

name: Psalm 96:3
text: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous works among all the peoples.

name: Psalm 96:4
text: For great is Yahweh, and greatly to be praised! He is to be feared above all gods.

name: Psalm 96:5
text: For all the gods of the peoples are idols, but Yahweh made the heavens.

name: Psalm 96:6
text: Honor and majesty are before him. Strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.

name: Psalm 96:7
text: Ascribe to Yahweh, you families of nations, ascribe to Yahweh glory and strength.

name: Psalm 96:8
text: Ascribe to Yahweh the glory due to his name. Bring an offering, and come into his courts.

name: Psalm 96:9
text: Worship Yahweh in holy array. Tremble before him, all the earth.

name: Psalm 96:10
text: Say among the nations, "Yahweh reigns." The world is also established. It can"t be moved. He will judge the peoples with equity.

name: Psalm 96:11
text: Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice. Let the sea roar, and its fullness!

name: Psalm 96:12
text: Let the field and all that is in it exult! Then all the trees of the woods shall sing for joy

name: Psalm 96:13
text: before Yahweh; for he comes, for he comes to judge the earth. He will judge the world with righteousness, the peoples with his truth.

name: Psalm 97:1
text: Yahweh reigns! Let the earth rejoice! Let the multitude of islands be glad!

name: Psalm 97:2
text: Clouds and darkness are around him. Righteousness and justice are the foundation of his throne.

name: Psalm 97:3
text: A fire goes before him, and burns up his adversaries on every side.

name: Psalm 97:4
text: His lightning lights up the world. The earth sees, and trembles.

name: Psalm 97:5
text: The mountains melt like wax at the presence of Yahweh, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.

name: Psalm 97:6
text: The heavens declare his righteousness. All the peoples have seen his glory.

name: Psalm 97:7
text: Let all them be shamed who serve engraved images, who boast in their idols. Worship him, all you gods!

name: Psalm 97:8
text: Zion heard and was glad. The daughters of Judah rejoiced, because of your judgments, Yahweh.

name: Psalm 97:9
text: For you, Yahweh, are most high above all the earth. You are exalted far above all gods.

name: Psalm 97:10
text: You who love Yahweh, hate evil. He preserves the souls of his saints. He delivers them out of the hand of the wicked.

name: Psalm 97:11
text: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.

name: Psalm 97:12
text: Be glad in Yahweh, you righteous people! Give thanks to his holy Name.

name: Psalm 98:1
text: A Psalm. Sing to Yahweh a new song, for he has done marvelous things! His right hand, and his holy arm, have worked salvation for him.

name: Psalm 98:2
text: Yahweh has made known his salvation. He has openly shown his righteousness in the sight of the nations.

name: Psalm 98:3
text: He has remembered his loving kindness and his faithfulness toward the house of Israel. All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.

name: Psalm 98:4
text: Make a joyful noise to Yahweh, all the earth! Burst out and sing for joy, yes, sing praises!

name: Psalm 98:5
text: Sing praises to Yahweh with the harp, with the harp and the voice of melody.

name: Psalm 98:6
text: With trumpets and sound of the ram"s horn, make a joyful noise before the King, Yahweh.

name: Psalm 98:7
text: Let the sea roar with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

name: Psalm 98:8
text: Let the rivers clap their hands. Let the mountains sing for joy together.

name: Psalm 98:9
text: Let them sing before Yahweh, for he comes to judge the earth. He will judge the world with righteousness, and the peoples with equity.

name: Psalm 99:1
text: Yahweh reigns! Let the peoples tremble. He sits enthroned among the cherubim. Let the earth be moved.

name: Psalm 99:2
text: Yahweh is great in Zion. He is high above all the peoples.

name: Psalm 99:3
text: Let them praise your great and awesome name. He is Holy!

name: Psalm 99:4
text: The King"s strength also loves justice. You do establish equity. You execute justice and righteousness in Jacob.

name: Psalm 99:5
text: Exalt Yahweh our God. Worship at his footstool. He is Holy!

name: Psalm 99:6
text: Moses and Aaron were among his priests, Samuel among those who call on his name; they called on Yahweh, and he answered them.

name: Psalm 99:7
text: He spoke to them in the pillar of cloud. They kept his testimonies, the statute that he gave them.

name: Psalm 99:8
text: You answered them, Yahweh our God. You are a God who forgave them, although you took vengeance for their doings.

name: Psalm 99:9
text: Exalt Yahweh, our God. Worship at his holy hill, for Yahweh, our God, is holy!

name: Psalm 100:1
text: A Psalm of thanksgiving. Shout for joy to Yahweh, all you lands!

name: Psalm 100:2
text: Serve Yahweh with gladness. Come before his presence with singing.

name: Psalm 100:3
text: Know that Yahweh, he is God. It is he who has made us, and we are his. We are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.

name: Psalm 100:4
text: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, into his courts with praise. Give thanks to him, and bless his name.

name: Psalm 100:5
text: For Yahweh is good. His loving kindness endures forever, his faithfulness to all generations.

name: Psalm 101:1
text: A Psalm by David. I will sing of loving kindness and justice. To you, Yahweh, I will sing praises.

name: Psalm 101:2
text: I will be careful to live a blameless life. When will you come to me? I will walk within my house with a blameless heart.

name: Psalm 101:3
text: I will set no vile thing before my eyes. I hate the deeds of faithless men. They will not cling to me.

name: Psalm 101:4
text: A perverse heart will be far from me. I will have nothing to do with evil.

name: Psalm 101:5
text: I will silence whoever secretly slanders his neighbor. I won"t tolerate one who is haughty and conceited.

name: Psalm 101:6
text: My eyes will be on the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me. He who walks in a perfect way, he will serve me.

name: Psalm 101:7
text: He who practices deceit won"t dwell within my house. He who speaks falsehood won"t be established before my eyes.

name: Psalm 101:8
text: Morning by morning, I will destroy all the wicked of the land; to cut off all the workers of iniquity from Yahweh"s city.

name: Psalm 102:1
text: A Prayer of the afflicted, when he is overwhelmed and pours out his complaint before Yahweh. Hear my prayer, Yahweh! Let my cry come to you.

name: Psalm 102:2
text: Don"t hide your face from me in the day of my distress. Turn your ear to me. Answer me quickly in the day when I call.

name: Psalm 102:3
text: For my days consume away like smoke. My bones are burned as a torch.

name: Psalm 102:4
text: My heart is blighted like grass, and withered, for I forget to eat my bread.

name: Psalm 102:5
text: By reason of the voice of my groaning, my bones stick to my skin.

name: Psalm 102:6
text: I am like a pelican of the wilderness. I have become as an owl of the waste places.

name: Psalm 102:7
text: I watch, and have become like a sparrow that is alone on the housetop.

name: Psalm 102:8
text: My enemies reproach me all day. Those who are mad at me use my name as a curse.

name: Psalm 102:9
text: For I have eaten ashes like bread, and mixed my drink with tears,

name: Psalm 102:10
text: Because of your indignation and your wrath, for you have taken me up, and thrown me away.

name: Psalm 102:11
text: My days are like a long shadow. I have withered like grass.

name: Psalm 102:12
text: But you, Yahweh, will remain forever; your renown endures to all generations.

name: Psalm 102:13
text: You will arise and have mercy on Zion; for it is time to have pity on her. Yes, the set time has come.

name: Psalm 102:14
text: For your servants take pleasure in her stones, and have pity on her dust.

name: Psalm 102:15
text: So the nations will fear the name of Yahweh; all the kings of the earth your glory.

name: Psalm 102:16
text: For Yahweh has built up Zion. He has appeared in his glory.

name: Psalm 102:17
text: He has responded to the prayer of the destitute, and has not despised their prayer.

name: Psalm 102:18
text: This will be written for the generation to come. A people which will be created will praise Yah.

name: Psalm 102:19
text: For he has looked down from the height of his sanctuary. From heaven, Yahweh saw the earth;

name: Psalm 102:20
text: to hear the groans of the prisoner; to free those who are condemned to death;

name: Psalm 102:21
text: that men may declare the name of Yahweh in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;

name: Psalm 102:22
text: when the peoples are gathered together, the kingdoms, to serve Yahweh.

name: Psalm 102:23
text: He weakened my strength along the course. He shortened my days.

name: Psalm 102:24
text: I said, "My God, don"t take me away in the midst of my days. Your years are throughout all generations.

name: Psalm 102:25
text: Of old, you laid the foundation of the earth. The heavens are the work of your hands.

name: Psalm 102:26
text: They will perish, but you will endure. Yes, all of them will wear out like a garment. You will change them like a cloak, and they will be changed.

name: Psalm 102:27
text: But you are the same. Your years will have no end.

name: Psalm 102:28
text: The children of your servants will continue. Their seed will be established before you."

name: Psalm 103:1
text: By David. Praise Yahweh, my soul! All that is within me, praise his holy name!

name: Psalm 103:2
text: Praise Yahweh, my soul, and don"t forget all his benefits;

name: Psalm 103:3
text: who forgives all your sins; who heals all your diseases;

name: Psalm 103:4
text: who redeems your life from destruction; who crowns you with loving kindness and tender mercies;

name: Psalm 103:5
text: who satisfies your desire with good things, so that your youth is renewed like the eagle"s.

name: Psalm 103:6
text: Yahweh executes righteous acts, and justice for all who are oppressed.

name: Psalm 103:7
text: He made known his ways to Moses, his deeds to the children of Israel.

name: Psalm 103:8
text: Yahweh is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and abundant in loving kindness.

name: Psalm 103:9
text: He will not always accuse; neither will he stay angry forever.

name: Psalm 103:10
text: He has not dealt with us according to our sins, nor repaid us for our iniquities.

name: Psalm 103:11
text: For as the heavens are high above the earth, so great is his loving kindness toward those who fear him.

name: Psalm 103:12
text: As far as the east is from the west, so far has he removed our transgressions from us.

name: Psalm 103:13
text: Like a father has compassion on his children, so Yahweh has compassion on those who fear him.

name: Psalm 103:14
text: For he knows how we are made. He remembers that we are dust.

name: Psalm 103:15
text: As for man, his days are like grass. As a flower of the field, so he flourishes.

name: Psalm 103:16
text: For the wind passes over it, and it is gone. Its place remembers it no more.

name: Psalm 103:17
text: But Yahweh"s loving kindness is from everlasting to everlasting with those who fear him, his righteousness to children"s children;

name: Psalm 103:18
text: to those who keep his covenant, to those who remember to obey his precepts.

name: Psalm 103:19
text: Yahweh has established his throne in the heavens. His kingdom rules over all.

name: Psalm 103:20
text: Praise Yahweh, you angels of his, who are mighty in strength, who fulfill his word, obeying the voice of his word.

name: Psalm 103:21
text: Praise Yahweh, all you armies of his, you servants of his, who do his pleasure.

name: Psalm 103:22
text: Praise Yahweh, all you works of his, in all places of his dominion. Praise Yahweh, my soul!

name: Psalm 104:1
text: Bless Yahweh, my soul. Yahweh, my God, you are very great. You are clothed with honor and majesty.

name: Psalm 104:2
text: He covers himself with light as with a garment. He stretches out the heavens like a curtain.

name: Psalm 104:3
text: He lays the beams of his rooms in the waters. He makes the clouds his chariot. He walks on the wings of the wind.

name: Psalm 104:4
text: He makes his messengers winds; his servants flames of fire.

name: Psalm 104:5
text: He laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be moved forever.

name: Psalm 104:6
text: You covered it with the deep as with a cloak. The waters stood above the mountains.

name: Psalm 104:7
text: At your rebuke they fled. At the voice of your thunder they hurried away.

name: Psalm 104:8
text: The mountains rose, the valleys sank down, to the place which you had assigned to them.

name: Psalm 104:9
text: You have set a boundary that they may not pass over; that they don"t turn again to cover the earth.

name: Psalm 104:10
text: He sends forth springs into the valleys. They run among the mountains.

name: Psalm 104:11
text: They give drink to every animal of the field. The wild donkeys quench their thirst.

name: Psalm 104:12
text: The birds of the sky nest by them. They sing among the branches.

name: Psalm 104:13
text: He waters the mountains from his rooms. The earth is filled with the fruit of your works.

name: Psalm 104:14
text: He causes the grass to grow for the livestock, and plants for man to cultivate, that he may bring forth food out of the earth:

name: Psalm 104:15
text: wine that makes glad the heart of man, oil to make his face to shine, and bread that strengthens man"s heart.

name: Psalm 104:16
text: Yahweh"s trees are well watered, the cedars of Lebanon, which he has planted;

name: Psalm 104:17
text: where the birds make their nests. The stork makes its home in the fir trees.

name: Psalm 104:18
text: The high mountains are for the wild goats. The rocks are a refuge for the rock badgers.

name: Psalm 104:19
text: He appointed the moon for seasons. The sun knows when to set.

name: Psalm 104:20
text: You make darkness, and it is night, in which all the animals of the forest prowl.

name: Psalm 104:21
text: The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their food from God.

name: Psalm 104:22
text: The sun rises, and they steal away, and lay down in their dens.

name: Psalm 104:23
text: Man goes forth to his work, to his labor until the evening.

name: Psalm 104:24
text: Yahweh, how many are your works! In wisdom have you made them all. The earth is full of your riches.

name: Psalm 104:25
text: There is the sea, great and wide, in which are innumerable living things, both small and large animals.

name: Psalm 104:26
text: There the ships go, and leviathan, whom you formed to play there.

name: Psalm 104:27
text: These all wait for you, that you may give them their food in due season.

name: Psalm 104:28
text: You give to them; they gather. You open your hand; they are satisfied with good.

name: Psalm 104:29
text: You hide your face: they are troubled; you take away their breath: they die, and return to the dust.

name: Psalm 104:30
text: You send forth your Spirit: they are created. You renew the face of the ground.

name: Psalm 104:31
text: Let the glory of Yahweh endure forever. Let Yahweh rejoice in his works.

name: Psalm 104:32
text: He looks at the earth, and it trembles. He touches the mountains, and they smoke.

name: Psalm 104:33
text: I will sing to Yahweh as long as I live. I will sing praise to my God while I have any being.

name: Psalm 104:34
text: Let your meditation be sweet to him. I will rejoice in Yahweh.

name: Psalm 104:35
text: Let sinners be consumed out of the earth. Let the wicked be no more. Bless Yahweh, my soul. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 105:1
text: Give thanks to Yahweh! Call on his name! Make his doings known among the peoples.

name: Psalm 105:2
text: Sing to him, sing praises to him! Tell of all his marvelous works.

name: Psalm 105:3
text: Glory in his holy name. Let the heart of those who seek Yahweh rejoice.

name: Psalm 105:4
text: Seek Yahweh and his strength. Seek his face forever more.

name: Psalm 105:5
text: Remember his marvelous works that he has done; his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth,

name: Psalm 105:6
text: you seed of Abraham, his servant, you children of Jacob, his chosen ones.

name: Psalm 105:7
text: He is Yahweh, our God. His judgments are in all the earth.

name: Psalm 105:8
text: He has remembered his covenant forever, the word which he commanded to a thousand generations,

name: Psalm 105:9
text: the covenant which he made with Abraham, his oath to Isaac,

name: Psalm 105:10
text: and confirmed the same to Jacob for a statute; to Israel for an everlasting covenant,

name: Psalm 105:11
text: saying, "To you I will give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance;"

name: Psalm 105:12
text: when they were but a few men in number, yes, very few, and foreigners in it.

name: Psalm 105:13
text: They went about from nation to nation, from one kingdom to another people.

name: Psalm 105:14
text: He allowed no one to do them wrong. Yes, he reproved kings for their sakes,

name: Psalm 105:15
text: "Don"t touch my anointed ones! Do my prophets no harm!"

name: Psalm 105:16
text: He called for a famine on the land. He destroyed the food supplies.

name: Psalm 105:17
text: He sent a man before them. Joseph was sold for a slave.

name: Psalm 105:18
text: They bruised his feet with shackles. His neck was locked in irons,

name: Psalm 105:19
text: until the time that his word happened, and Yahweh"s word proved him true.

name: Psalm 105:20
text: The king sent and freed him; even the ruler of peoples, and let him go free.

name: Psalm 105:21
text: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all of his possessions;

name: Psalm 105:22
text: to discipline his princes at his pleasure, and to teach his elders wisdom.

name: Psalm 105:23
text: Israel also came into Egypt. Jacob lived in the land of Ham.

name: Psalm 105:24
text: He increased his people greatly, and made them stronger than their adversaries.

name: Psalm 105:25
text: He turned their heart to hate his people, to conspire against his servants.

name: Psalm 105:26
text: He sent Moses, his servant, and Aaron, whom he had chosen.

name: Psalm 105:27
text: They performed miracles among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.

name: Psalm 105:28
text: He sent darkness, and made it dark. They didn"t rebel against his words.

name: Psalm 105:29
text: He turned their waters into blood, and killed their fish.

name: Psalm 105:30
text: Their land swarmed with frogs, even in the rooms of their kings.

name: Psalm 105:31
text: He spoke, and swarms of flies came, and lice in all their borders.

name: Psalm 105:32
text: He gave them hail for rain, with lightning in their land.

name: Psalm 105:33
text: He struck their vines and also their fig trees, and shattered the trees of their country.

name: Psalm 105:34
text: He spoke, and the locusts came, and the grasshoppers, without number,

name: Psalm 105:35
text: ate up every plant in their land; and ate up the fruit of their ground.

name: Psalm 105:36
text: He struck also all the firstborn in their land, the first fruits of all their manhood.

name: Psalm 105:37
text: He brought them forth with silver and gold. There was not one feeble person among his tribes.

name: Psalm 105:38
text: Egypt was glad when they departed, for the fear of them had fallen on them.

name: Psalm 105:39
text: He spread a cloud for a covering, fire to give light in the night.

name: Psalm 105:40
text: They asked, and he brought quails, and satisfied them with the bread of the sky.

name: Psalm 105:41
text: He opened the rock, and waters gushed out. They ran as a river in the dry places.

name: Psalm 105:42
text: For he remembered his holy word, and Abraham, his servant.

name: Psalm 105:43
text: He brought forth his people with joy, his chosen with singing.

name: Psalm 105:44
text: He gave them the lands of the nations. They took the labor of the peoples in possession,

name: Psalm 105:45
text: that they might keep his statutes, and observe his laws. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 106:1
text: Praise Yahweh! Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 106:2
text: Who can utter the mighty acts of Yahweh, or fully declare all his praise?

name: Psalm 106:3
text: Blessed are those who keep justice. Blessed is one who does what is right at all times.

name: Psalm 106:4
text: Remember me, Yahweh, with the favor that you show to your people. Visit me with your salvation,

name: Psalm 106:5
text: that I may see the prosperity of your chosen, that I may rejoice in the gladness of your nation, that I may glory with your inheritance.

name: Psalm 106:6
text: We have sinned with our fathers. We have committed iniquity. We have done wickedly.

name: Psalm 106:7
text: Our fathers didn"t understand your wonders in Egypt. They didn"t remember the multitude of your loving kindnesses, but were rebellious at the sea, even at the Red Sea.

name: Psalm 106:8
text: Nevertheless he saved them for his name"s sake, that he might make his mighty power known.

name: Psalm 106:9
text: He rebuked the Red Sea also, and it was dried up; so he led them through the depths, as through a desert.

name: Psalm 106:10
text: He saved them from the hand of him who hated them, and redeemed them from the hand of the enemy.

name: Psalm 106:11
text: The waters covered their adversaries. There was not one of them left.

name: Psalm 106:12
text: Then they believed his words. They sang his praise.

name: Psalm 106:13
text: They soon forgot his works. They didn"t wait for his counsel,

name: Psalm 106:14
text: but gave in to craving in the desert, and tested God in the wasteland.

name: Psalm 106:15
text: He gave them their request, but sent leanness into their soul.

name: Psalm 106:16
text: They envied Moses also in the camp, and Aaron, Yahweh"s saint.

name: Psalm 106:17
text: The earth opened and swallowed up Dathan, and covered the company of Abiram.

name: Psalm 106:18
text: A fire was kindled in their company. The flame burned up the wicked.

name: Psalm 106:19
text: They made a calf in Horeb, and worshiped a molten image.

name: Psalm 106:20
text: Thus they exchanged their glory for an image of a bull that eats grass.

name: Psalm 106:21
text: They forgot God, their Savior, who had done great things in Egypt,

name: Psalm 106:22
text: Wondrous works in the land of Ham, and awesome things by the Red Sea.

name: Psalm 106:23
text: Therefore he said that he would destroy them, had Moses, his chosen, not stood before him in the breach, to turn away his wrath, so that he wouldn"t destroy them.

name: Psalm 106:24
text: Yes, they despised the pleasant land. They didn"t believe his word,

name: Psalm 106:25
text: but murmured in their tents, and didn"t listen to Yahweh"s voice.

name: Psalm 106:26
text: Therefore he swore to them that he would overthrow them in the wilderness,

name: Psalm 106:27
text: that he would overthrow their seed among the nations, and scatter them in the lands.

name: Psalm 106:28
text: They joined themselves also to Baal Peor, and ate the sacrifices of the dead.

name: Psalm 106:29
text: Thus they provoked him to anger with their deeds. The plague broke in on them.

name: Psalm 106:30
text: Then Phinehas stood up, and executed judgment, so the plague was stopped.

name: Psalm 106:31
text: That was credited to him for righteousness, for all generations to come.

name: Psalm 106:32
text: They angered him also at the waters of Meribah, so that Moses was troubled for their sakes;

name: Psalm 106:33
text: because they were rebellious against his spirit, he spoke rashly with his lips.

name: Psalm 106:34
text: They didn"t destroy the peoples, as Yahweh commanded them,

name: Psalm 106:35
text: but mixed themselves with the nations, and learned their works.

name: Psalm 106:36
text: They served their idols, which became a snare to them.

name: Psalm 106:37
text: Yes, they sacrificed their sons and their daughters to demons.

name: Psalm 106:38
text: They shed innocent blood, even the blood of their sons and of their daughters, whom they sacrificed to the idols of Canaan. The land was polluted with blood.

name: Psalm 106:39
text: Thus were they defiled with their works, and prostituted themselves in their deeds.

name: Psalm 106:40
text: Therefore Yahweh burned with anger against his people. He abhorred his inheritance.

name: Psalm 106:41
text: He gave them into the hand of the nations. Those who hated them ruled over them.

name: Psalm 106:42
text: Their enemies also oppressed them. They were brought into subjection under their hand.

name: Psalm 106:43
text: Many times he delivered them, but they were rebellious in their counsel, and were brought low in their iniquity.

name: Psalm 106:44
text: Nevertheless he regarded their distress, when he heard their cry.

name: Psalm 106:45
text: He remembered for them his covenant, and repented according to the multitude of his loving kindnesses.

name: Psalm 106:46
text: He made them also to be pitied by all those who carried them captive.

name: Psalm 106:47
text: Save us, Yahweh, our God, gather us from among the nations, to give thanks to your holy name, to triumph in your praise!

name: Psalm 106:48
text: Blessed be Yahweh, the God of Israel, from everlasting even to everlasting! Let all the people say, "Amen." Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 107:1
text: Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 107:2
text: Let the redeemed by Yahweh say so, whom he has redeemed from the hand of the adversary,

name: Psalm 107:3
text: And gathered out of the lands, from the east and from the west, from the north and from the south.

name: Psalm 107:4
text: They wandered in the wilderness in a desert way. They found no city to live in.

name: Psalm 107:5
text: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.

name: Psalm 107:6
text: Then they cried to Yahweh in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses,

name: Psalm 107:7
text: he led them also by a straight way, that they might go to a city to live in.

name: Psalm 107:8
text: Let them praise Yahweh for his loving kindness, for his wonderful works to the children of men!

name: Psalm 107:9
text: For he satisfies the longing soul. He fills the hungry soul with good.

name: Psalm 107:10
text: Some sat in darkness and in the shadow of death, being bound in affliction and iron,

name: Psalm 107:11
text: because they rebelled against the words of God, and condemned the counsel of the Most High.

name: Psalm 107:12
text: Therefore he brought down their heart with labor. They fell down, and there was none to help.

name: Psalm 107:13
text: Then they cried to Yahweh in their trouble, and he saved them out of their distresses.

name: Psalm 107:14
text: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and broke their bonds in sunder.

name: Psalm 107:15
text: Let them praise Yahweh for his loving kindness, for his wonderful works to the children of men!

name: Psalm 107:16
text: For he has broken the gates of brass, and cut through bars of iron.

name: Psalm 107:17
text: Fools are afflicted because of their disobedience, and because of their iniquities.

name: Psalm 107:18
text: Their soul abhors all kinds of food. They draw near to the gates of death.

name: Psalm 107:19
text: Then they cry to Yahweh in their trouble, he saves them out of their distresses.

name: Psalm 107:20
text: He sends his word, and heals them, and delivers them from their graves.

name: Psalm 107:21
text: Let them praise Yahweh for his loving kindness, for his wonderful works to the children of men!

name: Psalm 107:22
text: Let them offer the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with singing.

name: Psalm 107:23
text: Those who go down to the sea in ships, who do business in great waters;

name: Psalm 107:24
text: These see Yahweh"s works, and his wonders in the deep.

name: Psalm 107:25
text: For he commands, and raises the stormy wind, which lifts up its waves.

name: Psalm 107:26
text: They mount up to the sky; they go down again to the depths. Their soul melts away because of trouble.

name: Psalm 107:27
text: They reel back and forth, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wits" end.

name: Psalm 107:28
text: Then they cry to Yahweh in their trouble, and he brings them out of their distress.

name: Psalm 107:29
text: He makes the storm a calm, so that its waves are still.

name: Psalm 107:30
text: Then they are glad because it is calm, so he brings them to their desired haven.

name: Psalm 107:31
text: Let them praise Yahweh for his loving kindness, for his wonderful works for the children of men!
