name: Psalm 107:32
text: Let them exalt him also in the assembly of the people, and praise him in the seat of the elders.

name: Psalm 107:33
text: He turns rivers into a desert, water springs into a thirsty ground,

name: Psalm 107:34
text: and a fruitful land into a salt waste, for the wickedness of those who dwell in it.

name: Psalm 107:35
text: He turns a desert into a pool of water, and a dry land into water springs.

name: Psalm 107:36
text: There he makes the hungry live, that they may prepare a city to live in,

name: Psalm 107:37
text: sow fields, plant vineyards, and reap the fruits of increase.

name: Psalm 107:38
text: He blesses them also, so that they are multiplied greatly. He doesn"t allow their livestock to decrease.

name: Psalm 107:39
text: Again, they are diminished and bowed down through oppression, trouble, and sorrow.

name: Psalm 107:40
text: He pours contempt on princes, and causes them to wander in a trackless waste.

name: Psalm 107:41
text: Yet he lifts the needy out of their affliction, and increases their families like a flock.

name: Psalm 107:42
text: The upright will see it, and be glad. All the wicked will shut their mouths.

name: Psalm 107:43
text: Whoever is wise will pay attention to these things. They will consider the loving kindnesses of Yahweh.

name: Psalm 108:1
text: A Song. A Psalm by David. My heart is steadfast, God. I will sing and I will make music with my soul.

name: Psalm 108:2
text: Wake up, harp and lyre! I will wake up the dawn.

name: Psalm 108:3
text: I will give thanks to you, Yahweh, among the nations. I will sing praises to you among the peoples.

name: Psalm 108:4
text: For your loving kindness is great above the heavens. Your faithfulness reaches to the skies.

name: Psalm 108:5
text: Be exalted, God, above the heavens! Let your glory be over all the earth.

name: Psalm 108:6
text: That your beloved may be delivered, save with your right hand, and answer us.

name: Psalm 108:7
text: God has spoken from his sanctuary: "In triumph, I will divide Shechem, and measure out the valley of Succoth.

name: Psalm 108:8
text: Gilead is mine. Manasseh is mine. Ephraim also is my helmet. Judah is my scepter.

name: Psalm 108:9
text: Moab is my wash pot. I will toss my sandal on Edom. I will shout over Philistia."

name: Psalm 108:10
text: Who will bring me into the fortified city? Who has led me to Edom?

name: Psalm 108:11
text: Haven"t you rejected us, God? You don"t go forth, God, with our armies.

name: Psalm 108:12
text: Give us help against the enemy, for the help of man is vain.

name: Psalm 108:13
text: Through God, we will do valiantly. For it is he who will tread down our enemies.

name: Psalm 109:1
text: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David. God of my praise, don"t remain silent,

name: Psalm 109:2
text: for they have opened the mouth of the wicked and the mouth of deceit against me. They have spoken to me with a lying tongue.

name: Psalm 109:3
text: They have also surrounded me with words of hatred, and fought against me without a cause.

name: Psalm 109:4
text: In return for my love, they are my adversaries; but I am in prayer.

name: Psalm 109:5
text: They have rewarded me evil for good, and hatred for my love.

name: Psalm 109:6
text: Set a wicked man over him. Let an adversary stand at his right hand.

name: Psalm 109:7
text: When he is judged, let him come forth guilty. Let his prayer be turned into sin.

name: Psalm 109:8
text: Let his days be few. Let another take his office.

name: Psalm 109:9
text: Let his children be fatherless, and his wife a widow.

name: Psalm 109:10
text: Let his children be wandering beggars. Let them be sought from their ruins.

name: Psalm 109:11
text: Let the creditor seize all that he has. Let strangers plunder the fruit of his labor.

name: Psalm 109:12
text: Let there be no one to extend kindness to him, neither let there be anyone to have pity on his fatherless children.

name: Psalm 109:13
text: Let his posterity be cut off. In the generation following let their name be blotted out.

name: Psalm 109:14
text: Let the iniquity of his fathers be remembered by Yahweh. Don"t let the sin of his mother be blotted out.

name: Psalm 109:15
text: Let them be before Yahweh continually, that he may cut off their memory from the earth;

name: Psalm 109:16
text: because he didn"t remember to show kindness, but persecuted the poor and needy man, the broken in heart, to kill them.

name: Psalm 109:17
text: Yes, he loved cursing, and it came to him. He didn"t delight in blessing, and it was far from him.

name: Psalm 109:18
text: He clothed himself also with cursing as with his garment. It came into his inward parts like water, like oil into his bones.

name: Psalm 109:19
text: Let it be to him as the clothing with which he covers himself, for the belt that is always around him.

name: Psalm 109:20
text: This is the reward of my adversaries from Yahweh, of those who speak evil against my soul.

name: Psalm 109:21
text: But deal with me, Yahweh the Lord, for your name"s sake, because your loving kindness is good, deliver me;

name: Psalm 109:22
text: for I am poor and needy. My heart is wounded within me.

name: Psalm 109:23
text: I fade away like an evening shadow. I am shaken off like a locust.

name: Psalm 109:24
text: My knees are weak through fasting. My body is thin and lacks fat.

name: Psalm 109:25
text: I have also become a reproach to them. When they see me, they shake their head.

name: Psalm 109:26
text: Help me, Yahweh, my God. Save me according to your loving kindness;

name: Psalm 109:27
text: that they may know that this is your hand; that you, Yahweh, have done it.

name: Psalm 109:28
text: They may curse, but you bless. When they arise, they will be shamed, but your servant shall rejoice.

name: Psalm 109:29
text: Let my adversaries be clothed with dishonor. Let them cover themselves with their own shame as with a robe.

name: Psalm 109:30
text: I will give great thanks to Yahweh with my mouth. Yes, I will praise him among the multitude.

name: Psalm 109:31
text: For he will stand at the right hand of the needy, to save him from those who judge his soul.

name: Psalm 110:1
text: A Psalm by David. Yahweh says to my Lord, "Sit at my right hand, until I make your enemies your footstool for your feet."

name: Psalm 110:2
text: Yahweh will send forth the rod of your strength out of Zion. Rule in the midst of your enemies.

name: Psalm 110:3
text: Your people offer themselves willingly in the day of your power, in holy array. Out of the womb of the morning, you have the dew of your youth.

name: Psalm 110:4
text: Yahweh has sworn, and will not change his mind: "You are a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek."

name: Psalm 110:5
text: The Lord is at your right hand. He will crush kings in the day of his wrath.

name: Psalm 110:6
text: He will judge among the nations. He will heap up dead bodies. He will crush the ruler of the whole earth.

name: Psalm 110:7
text: He will drink of the brook in the way; therefore he will lift up his head.

name: Psalm 111:1
text: Praise Yah! I will give thanks to Yahweh with my whole heart, in the council of the upright, and in the congregation.

name: Psalm 111:2
text: Yahweh"s works are great, pondered by all those who delight in them.

name: Psalm 111:3
text: His work is honor and majesty. His righteousness endures forever.

name: Psalm 111:4
text: He has caused his wonderful works to be remembered. Yahweh is gracious and merciful.

name: Psalm 111:5
text: He has given food to those who fear him. He always remembers his covenant.

name: Psalm 111:6
text: He has shown his people the power of his works, in giving them the heritage of the nations.

name: Psalm 111:7
text: The works of his hands are truth and justice. All his precepts are sure.

name: Psalm 111:8
text: They are established forever and ever. They are done in truth and uprightness.

name: Psalm 111:9
text: He has sent redemption to his people. He has ordained his covenant forever. His name is holy and awesome!

name: Psalm 111:10
text: The fear of Yahweh is the beginning of wisdom. All those who do his work have a good understanding. His praise endures forever!

name: Psalm 112:1
text: Praise Yah! Blessed is the man who fears Yahweh, who delights greatly in his commandments.

name: Psalm 112:2
text: His seed will be mighty in the land. The generation of the upright will be blessed.

name: Psalm 112:3
text: Wealth and riches are in his house. His righteousness endures forever.

name: Psalm 112:4
text: Light dawns in the darkness for the upright, gracious, merciful, and righteous.

name: Psalm 112:5
text: It is well with the man who deals graciously and lends. He will maintain his cause in judgment.

name: Psalm 112:6
text: For he will never be shaken. The righteous will be remembered forever.

name: Psalm 112:7
text: He will not be afraid of evil news. His heart is steadfast, trusting in Yahweh.

name: Psalm 112:8
text: His heart is established. He will not be afraid in the end when he sees his adversaries.

name: Psalm 112:9
text: He has dispersed, he has given to the poor. His righteousness endures forever. His horn will be exalted with honor.

name: Psalm 112:10
text: The wicked will see it, and be grieved. He shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away. The desire of the wicked will perish.

name: Psalm 113:1
text: Praise Yah! Praise, you servants of Yahweh, praise the name of Yahweh.

name: Psalm 113:2
text: Blessed be the name of Yahweh, from this time forth and forevermore.

name: Psalm 113:3
text: From the rising of the sun to the going down of the same, Yahweh"s name is to be praised.

name: Psalm 113:4
text: Yahweh is high above all nations, his glory above the heavens.

name: Psalm 113:5
text: Who is like Yahweh, our God, who has his seat on high,

name: Psalm 113:6
text: Who stoops down to see in heaven and in the earth?

name: Psalm 113:7
text: He raises up the poor out of the dust. Lifts up the needy from the ash heap;

name: Psalm 113:8
text: that he may set him with princes, even with the princes of his people.

name: Psalm 113:9
text: He settles the barren woman in her home, as a joyful mother of children. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 114:1
text: When Israel went forth out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of foreign language;

name: Psalm 114:2
text: Judah became his sanctuary, Israel his dominion.

name: Psalm 114:3
text: The sea saw it, and fled. The Jordan was driven back.

name: Psalm 114:4
text: The mountains skipped like rams, the little hills like lambs.

name: Psalm 114:5
text: What was it, you sea, that you fled? You Jordan, that you turned back?

name: Psalm 114:6
text: You mountains, that you skipped like rams; you little hills, like lambs?

name: Psalm 114:7
text: Tremble, you earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob,

name: Psalm 114:8
text: who turned the rock into a pool of water, the flint into a spring of waters.

name: Psalm 115:1
text: Not to us, Yahweh, not to us, but to your name give glory, for your loving kindness, and for your truth"s sake.

name: Psalm 115:2
text: Why should the nations say, "Where is their God, now?"

name: Psalm 115:3
text: But our God is in the heavens. He does whatever he pleases.

name: Psalm 115:4
text: Their idols are silver and gold, the work of men"s hands.

name: Psalm 115:5
text: They have mouths, but they don"t speak. They have eyes, but they don"t see.

name: Psalm 115:6
text: They have ears, but they don"t hear. They have noses, but they don"t smell.

name: Psalm 115:7
text: They have hands, but they don"t feel. They have feet, but they don"t walk, neither do they speak through their throat.

name: Psalm 115:8
text: Those who make them will be like them; yes, everyone who trusts in them.

name: Psalm 115:9
text: Israel, trust in Yahweh! He is their help and their shield.

name: Psalm 115:10
text: House of Aaron, trust in Yahweh! He is their help and their shield.

name: Psalm 115:11
text: You who fear Yahweh, trust in Yahweh! He is their help and their shield.

name: Psalm 115:12
text: Yahweh remembers us. He will bless us. He will bless the house of Israel. He will bless the house of Aaron.

name: Psalm 115:13
text: He will bless those who fear Yahweh, both small and great.

name: Psalm 115:14
text: May Yahweh increase you more and more, you and your children.

name: Psalm 115:15
text: Blessed are you by Yahweh, who made heaven and earth.

name: Psalm 115:16
text: The heavens are the heavens of Yahweh; but the earth has he given to the children of men.

name: Psalm 115:17
text: The dead don"t praise Yah, neither any who go down into silence;

name: Psalm 115:18
text: But we will bless Yah, from this time forth and forevermore. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 116:1
text: I love Yahweh, because he listens to my voice, and my cries for mercy.

name: Psalm 116:2
text: Because he has turned his ear to me, therefore I will call on him as long as I live.

name: Psalm 116:3
text: The cords of death surrounded me, the pains of Sheol got a hold of me. I found trouble and sorrow.

name: Psalm 116:4
text: Then I called on the name of Yahweh: "Yahweh, I beg you, deliver my soul."

name: Psalm 116:5
text: Yahweh is Gracious and righteous. Yes, our God is merciful.

name: Psalm 116:6
text: Yahweh preserves the simple. I was brought low, and he saved me.

name: Psalm 116:7
text: Return to your rest, my soul, for Yahweh has dealt bountifully with you.

name: Psalm 116:8
text: For you have delivered my soul from death, my eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.

name: Psalm 116:9
text: I will walk before Yahweh in the land of the living.

name: Psalm 116:10
text: I believed, therefore I said, "I was greatly afflicted."

name: Psalm 116:11
text: I said in my haste, "All men are liars."

name: Psalm 116:12
text: What will I give to Yahweh for all his benefits toward me?

name: Psalm 116:13
text: I will take the cup of salvation, and call on the name of Yahweh.

name: Psalm 116:14
text: I will pay my vows to Yahweh, yes, in the presence of all his people.

name: Psalm 116:15
text: Precious in the sight of Yahweh is the death of his saints.

name: Psalm 116:16
text: Yahweh, truly I am your servant. I am your servant, the son of your handmaid. You have freed me from my chains.

name: Psalm 116:17
text: I will offer to you the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call on the name of Yahweh.

name: Psalm 116:18
text: I will pay my vows to Yahweh, yes, in the presence of all his people,

name: Psalm 116:19
text: in the courts of Yahweh"s house, in the midst of you, Jerusalem. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 117:1
text: Praise Yahweh, all you nations! Extol him, all you peoples!

name: Psalm 117:2
text: For his loving kindness is great toward us. Yahweh"s faithfulness endures forever. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 118:1
text: Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 118:2
text: Let Israel now say that his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 118:3
text: Let the house of Aaron now say that his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 118:4
text: Now let those who fear Yahweh say that his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 118:5
text: Out of my distress, I called on Yah. Yah answered me with freedom.

name: Psalm 118:6
text: Yahweh is on my side. I will not be afraid. What can man do to me?

name: Psalm 118:7
text: Yahweh is on my side among those who help me. Therefore I will look in triumph at those who hate me.

name: Psalm 118:8
text: It is better to take refuge in Yahweh, than to put confidence in man.

name: Psalm 118:9
text: It is better to take refuge in Yahweh, than to put confidence in princes.

name: Psalm 118:10
text: All the nations surrounded me, but in the name of Yahweh, I cut them off.

name: Psalm 118:11
text: They surrounded me, yes, they surrounded me. In the name of Yahweh I indeed cut them off.

name: Psalm 118:12
text: They surrounded me like bees. They are quenched like the burning thorns. In the name of Yahweh I cut them off.

name: Psalm 118:13
text: You pushed me back hard, to make me fall, but Yahweh helped me.

name: Psalm 118:14
text: Yah is my strength and song. He has become my salvation.

name: Psalm 118:15
text: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tents of the righteous. "The right hand of Yahweh does valiantly.

name: Psalm 118:16
text: The right hand of Yahweh is exalted! The right hand of Yahweh does valiantly!"

name: Psalm 118:17
text: I will not die, but live, and declare Yah"s works.

name: Psalm 118:18
text: Yah has punished me severely, but he has not given me over to death.

name: Psalm 118:19
text: Open to me the gates of righteousness. I will enter into them. I will give thanks to Yah.

name: Psalm 118:20
text: This is the gate of Yahweh; the righteous will enter into it.

name: Psalm 118:21
text: I will give thanks to you, for you have answered me, and have become my salvation.

name: Psalm 118:22
text: The stone which the builders rejected has become the head of the corner.

name: Psalm 118:23
text: This is Yahweh"s doing. It is marvelous in our eyes.

name: Psalm 118:24
text: This is the day that Yahweh has made. We will rejoice and be glad in it!

name: Psalm 118:25
text: Save us now, we beg you, Yahweh! Yahweh, we beg you, send prosperity now.

name: Psalm 118:26
text: Blessed is he who comes in the name of Yahweh! We have blessed you out of the house of Yahweh.

name: Psalm 118:27
text: Yahweh is God, and he has given us light. Bind the sacrifice with cords, even to the horns of the altar.

name: Psalm 118:28
text: You are my God, and I will give thanks to you. You are my God, I will exalt you.

name: Psalm 118:29
text: Oh give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 119:1
text: ALEPH Blessed are those whose ways are blameless, who walk according to Yahweh"s law.

name: Psalm 119:2
text: Blessed are those who keep his statutes, who seek him with their whole heart.

name: Psalm 119:3
text: Yes, they do nothing wrong. They walk in his ways.

name: Psalm 119:4
text: You have commanded your precepts, that we should fully obey them.

name: Psalm 119:5
text: Oh that my ways were steadfast to obey your statutes!

name: Psalm 119:6
text: Then I wouldn"t be disappointed, when I consider all of your commandments.

name: Psalm 119:7
text: I will give thanks to you with uprightness of heart, when I learn your righteous judgments.

name: Psalm 119:8
text: I will observe your statutes. Don"t utterly forsake me. BET

name: Psalm 119:9
text: How can a young man keep his way pure? By living according to your word.

name: Psalm 119:10
text: With my whole heart, I have sought you. Don"t let me wander from your commandments.

name: Psalm 119:11
text: I have hidden your word in my heart, that I might not sin against you.

name: Psalm 119:12
text: Blessed are you, Yahweh. Teach me your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:13
text: With my lips, I have declared all the ordinances of your mouth.

name: Psalm 119:14
text: I have rejoiced in the way of your testimonies, as much as in all riches.

name: Psalm 119:15
text: I will meditate on your precepts, and consider your ways.

name: Psalm 119:16
text: I will delight myself in your statutes. I will not forget your word. GIMEL

name: Psalm 119:17
text: Do good to your servant. I will live and I will obey your word.

name: Psalm 119:18
text: Open my eyes, that I may see wondrous things out of your law.

name: Psalm 119:19
text: I am a stranger on the earth. Don"t hide your commandments from me.

name: Psalm 119:20
text: My soul is consumed with longing for your ordinances at all times.

name: Psalm 119:21
text: You have rebuked the proud who are cursed, who wander from your commandments.

name: Psalm 119:22
text: Take reproach and contempt away from me, for I have kept your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:23
text: Though princes sit and slander me, your servant will meditate on your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:24
text: Indeed your statutes are my delight, and my counselors. DALED

name: Psalm 119:25
text: My soul is laid low in the dust. Revive me according to your word!

name: Psalm 119:26
text: I declared my ways, and you answered me. Teach me your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:27
text: Let me understand the teaching of your precepts! Then I will meditate on your wondrous works.

name: Psalm 119:28
text: My soul is weary with sorrow: strengthen me according to your word.

name: Psalm 119:29
text: Keep me from the way of deceit. Grant me your law graciously!

name: Psalm 119:30
text: I have chosen the way of truth. I have set your ordinances before me.

name: Psalm 119:31
text: I cling to your statutes, Yahweh. Don"t let me be disappointed.

name: Psalm 119:32
text: I run in the path of your commandments, for you have set my heart free. HEY

name: Psalm 119:33
text: Teach me, Yahweh, the way of your statutes. I will keep them to the end.

name: Psalm 119:34
text: Give me understanding, and I will keep your law. Yes, I will obey it with my whole heart.

name: Psalm 119:35
text: Direct me in the path of your commandments, for I delight in them.

name: Psalm 119:36
text: Turn my heart toward your statutes, not toward selfish gain.

name: Psalm 119:37
text: Turn my eyes away from looking at worthless things. Revive me in your ways.

name: Psalm 119:38
text: Fulfill your promise to your servant, that you may be feared.

name: Psalm 119:39
text: Take away my disgrace that I dread, for your ordinances are good.

name: Psalm 119:40
text: Behold, I long for your precepts! Revive me in your righteousness. WAW

name: Psalm 119:41
text: Let your loving kindness also come to me, Yahweh, your salvation, according to your word.

name: Psalm 119:42
text: So I will have an answer for him who reproaches me, for I trust in your word.

name: Psalm 119:43
text: Don"t snatch the word of truth out of my mouth, for I put my hope in your ordinances.

name: Psalm 119:44
text: So I will obey your law continually, forever and ever.

name: Psalm 119:45
text: I will walk in liberty, for I have sought your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:46
text: I will also speak of your statutes before kings, and will not be disappointed.

name: Psalm 119:47
text: I will delight myself in your commandments, because I love them.

name: Psalm 119:48
text: I reach out my hands for your commandments, which I love. I will meditate on your statutes. ZAYIN

name: Psalm 119:49
text: Remember your word to your servant, because you gave me hope.

name: Psalm 119:50
text: This is my comfort in my affliction, for your word has revived me.

name: Psalm 119:51
text: The arrogant mock me excessively, but I don"t swerve from your law.

name: Psalm 119:52
text: I remember your ordinances of old, Yahweh, and have comforted myself.

name: Psalm 119:53
text: Indignation has taken hold on me, because of the wicked who forsake your law.

name: Psalm 119:54
text: Your statutes have been my songs, in the house where I live.

name: Psalm 119:55
text: I have remembered your name, Yahweh, in the night, and I obey your law.

name: Psalm 119:56
text: This is my way, that I keep your precepts. CHET

name: Psalm 119:57
text: Yahweh is my portion. I promised to obey your words.

name: Psalm 119:58
text: I sought your favor with my whole heart. Be merciful to me according to your word.

name: Psalm 119:59
text: I considered my ways, and turned my steps to your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:60
text: I will hurry, and not delay, to obey your commandments.

name: Psalm 119:61
text: The ropes of the wicked bind me, but I won"t forget your law.

name: Psalm 119:62
text: At midnight I will rise to give thanks to you, because of your righteous ordinances.

name: Psalm 119:63
text: I am a friend of all those who fear you, of those who observe your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:64
text: The earth is full of your loving kindness, Yahweh. Teach me your statutes. TET

name: Psalm 119:65
text: Do good to your servant, according to your word, Yahweh.

name: Psalm 119:66
text: Teach me good judgment and knowledge, for I believe in your commandments.

name: Psalm 119:67
text: Before I was afflicted, I went astray; but now I observe your word.

name: Psalm 119:68
text: You are good, and do good. Teach me your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:69
text: The proud have smeared a lie upon me. With my whole heart, I will keep your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:70
text: Their heart is as callous as the fat, but I delight in your law.

name: Psalm 119:71
text: It is good for me that I have been afflicted, that I may learn your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:72
text: The law of your mouth is better to me than thousands of pieces of gold and silver. YUD

name: Psalm 119:73
text: Your hands have made me and formed me. Give me understanding, that I may learn your commandments.

name: Psalm 119:74
text: Those who fear you will see me and be glad, because I have put my hope in your word.

name: Psalm 119:75
text: Yahweh, I know that your judgments are righteous, that in faithfulness you have afflicted me.

name: Psalm 119:76
text: Please let your loving kindness be for my comfort, according to your word to your servant.

name: Psalm 119:77
text: Let your tender mercies come to me, that I may live; for your law is my delight.

name: Psalm 119:78
text: Let the proud be disappointed, for they have overthrown me wrongfully. I will meditate on your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:79
text: Let those who fear you turn to me. They will know your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:80
text: Let my heart be blameless toward your decrees, that I may not be disappointed. KAF

name: Psalm 119:81
text: My soul faints for your salvation. I hope in your word.

name: Psalm 119:82
text: My eyes fail for your word. I say, "When will you comfort me?"

name: Psalm 119:83
text: For I have become like a wineskin in the smoke. I don"t forget your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:84
text: How many are the days of your servant? When will you execute judgment on those who persecute me?

name: Psalm 119:85
text: The proud have dug pits for me, contrary to your law.

name: Psalm 119:86
text: All of your commandments are faithful. They persecute me wrongfully. Help me!

name: Psalm 119:87
text: They had almost wiped me from the earth, but I didn"t forsake your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:88
text: Preserve my life according to your loving kindness, so I will obey the statutes of your mouth. LAMED

name: Psalm 119:89
text: Yahweh, your word is settled in heaven forever.

name: Psalm 119:90
text: Your faithfulness is to all generations. You have established the earth, and it remains.

name: Psalm 119:91
text: Your laws remain to this day, for all things serve you.

name: Psalm 119:92
text: Unless your law had been my delight, I would have perished in my affliction.

name: Psalm 119:93
text: I will never forget your precepts, for with them, you have revived me.

name: Psalm 119:94
text: I am yours. Save me, for I have sought your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:95
text: The wicked have waited for me, to destroy me. I will consider your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:96
text: I have seen a limit to all perfection, but your commands are boundless. MEM

name: Psalm 119:97
text: How I love your law! It is my meditation all day.

name: Psalm 119:98
text: Your commandments make me wiser than my enemies, for your commandments are always with me.

name: Psalm 119:99
text: I have more understanding than all my teachers, for your testimonies are my meditation.

name: Psalm 119:100
text: I understand more than the aged, because I have kept your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:101
text: I have kept my feet from every evil way, that I might observe your word.

name: Psalm 119:102
text: I have not turned aside from your ordinances, for you have taught me.

name: Psalm 119:103
text: How sweet are your promises to my taste, more than honey to my mouth!

name: Psalm 119:104
text: Through your precepts, I get understanding; therefore I hate every false way. NUN

name: Psalm 119:105
text: Your word is a lamp to my feet, and a light for my path.

name: Psalm 119:106
text: I have sworn, and have confirmed it, that I will obey your righteous ordinances.

name: Psalm 119:107
text: I am afflicted very much. Revive me, Yahweh, according to your word.

name: Psalm 119:108
text: Accept, I beg you, the willing offerings of my mouth. Yahweh, teach me your ordinances.

name: Psalm 119:109
text: My soul is continually in my hand, yet I won"t forget your law.

name: Psalm 119:110
text: The wicked have laid a snare for me, yet I haven"t gone astray from your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:111
text: I have taken your testimonies as a heritage forever, for they are the joy of my heart.

name: Psalm 119:112
text: I have set my heart to perform your statutes forever, even to the end. SAMEKH

name: Psalm 119:113
text: I hate double-minded men, but I love your law.

name: Psalm 119:114
text: You are my hiding place and my shield. I hope in your word.

name: Psalm 119:115
text: Depart from me, you evildoers, that I may keep the commandments of my God.

name: Psalm 119:116
text: Uphold me according to your word, that I may live. Let me not be ashamed of my hope.
